title: Akshay talks about filming ‘Jolly LLB 2’, calls ‘Jolly’ his dream character
text:
Akshay talks about filming ‘Jolly LLB 2’, calls ‘Jolly’ his dream character Akshay talks about filming ‘Jolly LLB 2’, calls ‘Jolly’ his dream character Currently reading: Akshay talks about filming ‘Jolly LLB 2’, calls ‘Jolly’ his dream character #Akshay Kumar India TV Entertainment Desk, New Delhi [ Published on: 01 Feb 2017, 18:04:25] Actor Akshay Kumar who is gearing up for the release of his upcoming film ‘Jolly LLB 2’ recently revealed that the role of the lawyer that he has portrayed in the film was his dream role. He even informed that the shooting of the film had to start in January 2017 but fortunately it began earlier and thus it is releasing this month. 
While talking to a leading entertainment portal, Khiladi Kumar stated that he was very impressed with the film so when the other film that he was going to do got delayed he came up with this movie first because he wanted to play the character. 
The actor also got candid about his equation with actor Annu Kapoor and praised him to skies. He stated that Annu has good control over Hindi language and had lot of stories to tell during the shoot of the film. 
Actress Huma Qureshi who was also present at the interview was all praises of Khiladi Kumar and wished to get cast opposite him in other movies as well. 
The trailer of ‘Jolly LLB 2’ received positive response from the audience. Akshay’s humour and Annu Kapoor’s powerful performance impressed movie buffs. The flick is the sequel of 2013 film ‘Jolly LLB’. Directed by Subhash Kapoor, the flick is slated to release on February 10. X
